answerText: Marcel Proust[10] The Baron de Charlus and Saint-Loup appear in this seven-volume series of Proust novels, composed of the stream-of-consciousness recollections of the narrator after eating a madeleine.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 4 | 18 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In one of his stories, Baldassare Silvande gives his nephew Alexis a series of lavish gifts because he is aware of his impending death. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author of Pleasures and Regrets and Jean Santeuil, who described the homosexual affairs of the Baron de Charlus in Sodom and Gomorrah.
